arts.ttl: Arsenal NIGHTMARE: Man Utd submit €100m offer for Nigeria superstar
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim is reportedly set to be handed a reduced transfer budget to work with in 2025, following Man Utd’s recent woes in the market, but Lookman is on the Red Devils’ list of potential targets amid reports that Alejandro Garnacho and Marcus Rashford could leave Old Trafford. Lookman will have just one year remaining on his Atalanta contract when the 2025 summer transfer window opens, with the Nigeria international signing a four-year deal upon his arrival from RB Leipzig in 2022.

arts.ttl: Lukaku HAUNTED by Osimhen at Napoli
arts.sum: Concerns have been raised over Romelu Lukaku ’s form at Napoli, with the striker said to be haunted by the ghost of Victor Osimhen at the Serie A club. Lukaku joined Napoli from Chelsea in a €30 million deal in the summer, and it might have been that Osimhen moved in the opposite direction.

arts.ttl: “Victor has every Intention to stay”: Okan Buruk discusses Osimhen’s future at Galatasaray
arts.sum: The future of Victor Osimhen, the Nigerian striker currently on loan at Galatasaray from Napoli, remains a hot topic as he enjoys a standout season in Turkey. With six goals in the league and two in the Europa League, Osimhen’s impressive performances have drawn attention from clubs across Europe, including teams in Italy, the Premier League, and Paris Saint-Germain. Despite the speculation surrounding his potential transfer, Galatasaray’s coach Okan Buruk has firmly stated that Osimhen will not be leaving the club in January. He addressed the situation in a recent press conference, saying, “Victor has every intention to stay here The post “Victor has every Intention to stay”: Okan Buruk discusses Osimhen’s future at Galatasaray appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Manchester United Weigh Move for Napoli Loanee Osimhen
arts.sum: Manchester United have started to show interest in Victor Osimhen, who’s producing in spades in Turkey. They are mulling offering a swap that could entice Napoli to sell the striker. They plot to propose Joshua Zirkzee and some cash consideration in return. The post Manchester United Weigh Move for Napoli Loanee Osimhen appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Man United 'could use struggling attacker' as a 'makeweight' in Victor Osimhen move
arts.sum: Manchester United allegedly eye a move for Napoli striker Victor Osimhen in a deal which could see the struggling Joshua Zirkzee move in the opposite direction.
